lead_paragraph: The department, after a two-year investigation, decided to keep the complex regulatory environment of music licensing largely intact, with the addition of a rule requiring “100 percent” deals. This breaks down what that means.

headline.print_headline: Federal Ruling on Music Licensing Frustrates Industry
headline.main: How a Justice Department Ruling Could Affect Your Favorite Musician

snippet: The department, after a two-year investigation, decided to keep the complex regulatory environment of music licensing largely intact, with the addition of a rule requiring “100 percent” deals. This breaks down what that means....
abstract: Justice Dept ends its two-year probe into music licensing by deciding not to alter regulatory agreements that govern Ascap and BMI; questions and answers about decision provided.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers
